transcript_title: Pierre Poilievre vows action on Ring of Fire, hits back at President Trump – March 19, 2025

description: Appoint a minister responsible for official languages.
quote: Yes I will appoint a minister responsible for official languages.
transcript_title: Pierre Poilievre vows action on Ring of Fire, hits back at President Trump – March 19, 2025

description: Repeal the entire carbon tax system, including the federal backstop for industrial emissions.
quote: Today I'm am announcing that a common sense Canada first conservative government will repeal the entire carbon tax including the federal backtop that requires provinces impose industrial taxes.
transcript_title: Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre vows to scrap entire carbon pricing system – March 17, 2025

description: No federal obligation for provinces to impose carbon taxes.
quote: Instead provinces will continue to have the freedom to to address this issue how they like but there will be no federal obligation to impose the tax.
transcript_title: Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre vows to scrap entire carbon pricing system – March 17, 2025

description: Use technology instead of taxes to fight climate change and protect the environment.
quote: Instead of taxes we will use technology technology not taxes is the best way to fight climate change and protect our environment.
transcript_title: Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre vows to scrap entire carbon pricing system – March 17, 2025

description: Expand eligibility for clean technology and clean manufacturing investment tax credits.
quote: We will expand ibility for the clean technology and clean manufacturing investment tax credits.
transcript_title: Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre vows to scrap entire carbon pricing system – March 17, 2025

description: Cut taxes on clean production to bring jobs and production home and reduce global emissions.
quote: Cutting taxes on clean production will bring jobs and production home and bring Global emissions down.
transcript_title: Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre vows to scrap entire carbon pricing system – March 17, 2025

description: Lower income tax and investment tax, and ax the sales tax on new homes.
quote: This plan will lower income tax investment tax we will ask the sales tax on new homes to save you up to 50 Grand on the purchase of a new house.
transcript_title: Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre vows to scrap entire carbon pricing system – March 17, 2025

description: Repeal C-69 and rapidly approve LNG plants, pipelines, mines, and port expansions.
quote: So why don't we repeal c69 the no new pipelines law rapidly approve l& plants pipelines mines Port expansions.
transcript_title: Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre vows to scrap entire carbon pricing system – March 17, 2025

description: Strengthen local and independent journalism.
quote: My platform will have measures that will strengthen local and independent journalism and give actually better and stronger voices to local journalism that we even have right now.
transcript_title: Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre vows to scrap entire carbon pricing system – March 17, 2025

description: Celebrate Canadian heritage and identity, including naming public monuments after historical figures.
quote: We will be naming public monuments uh after him and many of other our other historical figures we will put a renewed focus on celebrating the military history.
transcript_title: Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre vows to scrap entire carbon pricing system – March 17, 2025

description: Expand programs like the Cadet Corps to bring people together and celebrate Canadian history.
quote: We will ensure that our young people have chances to participate in that history by expanding for example the Cadet Corps uh and other programs that bring our people together from coast to coast to coast.
transcript_title: Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre vows to scrap entire carbon pricing system – March 17, 2025
